tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went overthere because i was suffering from pain in my tooth not able to eat anything  and serioulsy dr shivesh and dr vidhi did an amazing work in my tooth after that i got the complete relief  apart from this they are frankly also so over all i can say it's a  really good and budget friendly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great doctors with great amenities.. I was in severe pain since last many days due to swelling in my lower last tooth but Dr. Shines removed that extra tissue so carefully with laser.. I didn't get any stitches in fact..  I am so grateful that I met him..  Thanks..
reply_text: Appreciate your valuable feedback.take care keep well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited dentlife and my experience was very good. All the doctors are very good and kind. They explained me everything before doing the procedure. Dr.vidhi did all my root canals and tooth color fillings. Dr.shivesh and Dr. Nidhi did my implant in lower teeth which was all painless. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.shivesh is such a genuine doctor. Evrybody told me to get my tooth removed but he recommended me that i should save my tooth. Using an advanced procedure using laser he increased my tooth length and gave me a cap over it after doing my RCT.thanks to him

review: visited Dentlife dental care centre 3 weeks back with lot of problems in my teeth.. all thanks to the great team effort that i love my teeth again.. i had pain in upper tooth which needed root canal..Dr.Vidhi did my RCT so painlessly..then i was worried about my teeth color which is yellow..
